message: I propose a 90/10 split.  I think it's a fair starting point, considering we both have an equal chance to make a counter-offer.
You wanted a 90/10 split, I'll offer a 85/15 split. Is this more to your liking?
Since you rejected my initial offer, and I'm facing inflation, I'm going to counter with a 70/30 split.  This is still a significant gain for you, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
You're willing to give me 30%? I'll meet you in the middle with a 75/25 split. Will you accept?
